A selection of video tutorials help you.message: 精选的视频教程可以帮助你开始学习，看看如何将ISLE融入你的课堂。

help.join-community.message: 在讨论论坛中提出有关文档和项目的问题。

help.maintained-by-people.message: 这个项目是由一群专门的人维护的。
help.maintained-by-people.description: Paragraph mentioning that project is maintained by multiple people

help.stay-updated.message: 通过浏览ISLE编辑器的releases，了解本项目的新内容。

Information on the features of ISLE and.message: 关于国际土壤环境法的特点和为其发展提供信息的相关研究项目的信息可在项目网站上查阅。

open-link.description: Label for button to open link.

overview.faq-intro.message: 关于如何利用ISLE为您的班级服务的常见问题，我们在常见问题中收集了答案。

overview.get-started.description: Label for how to get started.

overview.isle-dashboard-intro.message: 使用ISLE仪表板来管理您的课程，管理课程，并监控学生的进度。
overview.isle-dashboard-intro.description: Introduction of ISLE dashboard for course management.

overview.isle-editor-into.message: 使用ISLE编辑器来创建新的ISLE课程，从交互式讲座到实验活动或家庭作业。
overview.isle-editor-into.description: Introduction of ISLE editor for creating lessons.

overview.isle-server-intro.message: 托管一个ISLE服务器实例，用于用户管理和数据收集，或部署到现有服务器上。

overview.welcome.message: 欢迎阅读交互式统计学习环境(ISLE)文件和ISLE编辑器，用于编写统计和相关学科的交互式课程。我们的目标之一是鼓励大学和其他学习机构的教师将其用于他们的目的。如有疑问，请通过电子邮件联系我们，电子邮件地址是pgb AT andrew.cmu.edu。
overview.welcome.description: Welcome message at beginning of documentation

theme.AnnouncementBar.closeButtonAriaLab.description: The ARIA label for close button of announcement bar

theme.blog.paginator.navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the blog pagination

theme.blog.paginator.newerEntries.description: The label used to navigate to the newer blog posts page (previous page)

theme.blog.paginator.olderEntries.description: The label used to navigate to the older blog posts page (next page)

theme.blog.post.paginator.navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the blog posts pagination

theme.BlogListPaginator.newerEntries.description: The label used to navigate to the newer blog posts page (previous page)

theme.BlogListPaginator.olderEntries.description: The label used to navigate to the older blog posts page (next page)

theme.BlogPostItem.readMore.description: The label used in blog post item excerps to link to full blog posts

theme.BlogPostPaginator.newerPost.description: The blog post button label to navigate to the newer/previous post

theme.BlogPostPaginator.olderPost.description: The blog post button label to navigate to the older/next post

theme.CodeBlock.copied.description: The copied button label on code blocks

theme.CodeBlock.copy.description: The copy button label on code blocks

theme.DocPaginator.next.description: The label used to navigate to the next doc

theme.DocPaginator.previous.description: The label used to navigate to the previous doc

theme.EditThisPage.editThisPage.description: The link label to edit the current page

theme.NotFound.p1.message: 我们找不到你要找的东西。
theme.NotFound.p1.description: The first paragraph of the 404 page

theme.NotFound.p2.message: 请联系链接您的原始网址的网站所有者，并让他们知道他们的链接被破坏了。

theme.Playground.liveEditor.description: The live editor label of the live codeblocks

theme.Playground.result.description: The result label of the live codeblocks

theme.SkipToContent.skipToMainContent.description: The skip to content label used for accessibility, allowing to rapidly navigate to main content with keyboard tab/enter navigation

video-tutorials.channel-intro.message: 关于ISLE的完整视频列表可在该项目的YouTube频道上查阅。
